title:
Microsoft Purview | Endpoint DLP â€“ Restrict copying sensitive files
to remote desktop (RDP) sessions (U.S. Government clouds)
description: With this update, you will be able to create Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies to regulate the sharing of sensitive data over an RDP session. DLP controls for RDP include support for deploying DLP policies in Audit mode, Block with Override mode, and Block mode.
